title: Governor KP meets NA Speaker, discusses political affairs
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 09 (APP):Governor Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Faisal Karim Kundi, met with Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Thursday, where they discussed the countryâ€™s political and provincial situation, as well as relations between the Federation and the provinces.
During the meeting, both leaders exchanged views on the current political landscape, the need for enhanced parliamentary cooperation, and the importance of building national consensus. They also held consultations on the political situation in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
The two leaders reviewed the dynamics between their allied political parties and agreed that strengthening the democratic system, promoting parliamentary traditions, and addressing public issues require close cooperation among political parties and improved coordination between the Federation and the provinces.
